member.name: M:MoneyManager.Api.Controllers.v1.CategoriesController.Get(MoneyManager.Api.Core.Features.Categories.Queries.GetAllCategories.Query)
member.returns: A list of categories according to the specified page parameters.

member.name: M:MoneyManager.Api.Controllers.v1.CategoriesController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.returns: A category with the specified id.

member.summary: Updates a category with the specified id.

member.name: M:MoneyManager.Api.Controllers.v1.CategoriesController.Delete(System.Int32)

member.name: M:MoneyManager.Api.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Authenticate(MoneyManager.Api.Core.Features.Users.Queries.AuthenticateUser.Query)
